text: Walsura robusta is a tree species described by William Roxburgh; it is included in the family Meliaceae. No subspecies are listed in the Catalogue of Life. In Vietnamese its name is lòng tong. ==References== Roxb., 1832 In: Hort. Beng. 32 (1814), nom. nud., Fl. Ind. 2: 386 World Plants: Synonymic Checklists of the Vascular Plants of the World * * robusta Category:Flora of Indo-China Category:Trees of Vietnam
title: Walsura robusta
